description:
Max Beizer

You keep an eye on all the new frameworks &emdash;so you’ve heard of Elixir’s Phoenix Framework.

But did you know that websockets is one of Phoenix’s core features?

No more external dependencies: phoenix.js and the Phoenix core make websockets so easy that even Rubyists can do it.
